tip.cancel: Cancel the creation of the document

tip.tax: Enable it if you work with taxes, for example with VAT

msg.error_msg: An error occurred during the operation
msg.doc_num_query: Open the "Document number" field for editing?

msg.cnc_com_err1: As a result of the recalculation of the cost of one of the acceptance goods, a negative quantity of this product was obtained at one of the stages of its movement
msg.cnc_com_err2: As a result of the operation, a negative quantity was received in the warehouse of one of the goods of the document
msg.cnc_com_succs: The document "{{name}}" has been successfully removed from the completion
msg.file_del_qury: Do you want to delete this file?
msg.file_del_warn: The file will not be permanently deleted, it will remain in the library "{{name}}"
msg.ne_perm_creat: Not enough permissions for create document "{{name}}"

msg.res_not_saved: Some items did not have a reserve saved, because it exceeded the ordered or available quantity of goods
msg.cant_crte_mor: The document cannot be created. For one or more items, the quantity of goods for sale exceeds the available quantity of goods
msg.no_pos: Unable to create a document without goods items
msg.there_cashbox: The sales register with this factory number (FN) is already in the company's database. The FN must be unique. If there is no sales registers with such a FN in the list of sales registers, check the list of deleted sales registers, and, if necessary, restore the deleted sales register
msg.ne_money: There are not enough cash in the sales register to create a document "{{name}}"
msg.pi_w_oo_compl: Payment in with this Order out is already completed
msg.pi_w_po_compl: Payment in with this Payment out is already completed
msg.user_login_th: A user with this username is already in the system
msg.user_email_th: A user with this e-mail is already in the system
msg.cant_decmp_wd: The document "Withdrawal" is not accessible to cancel the completion. To return money to the sales register, use the documents "Order out" and "Depositing"
msg.cant_decmp_dp: The document "Depositing" is not accessible to cancel the completion. To return money from the sales register to the cash room, use the documents "Withdrawal" and "Order in"
msg.ne_money_op: There are not enough money to carry out this operation
msg.ne_prod_movng: The quantity of goods to be moved in one of the positions is more than the available quantity of goods in department
msg.minus_on_dprt: As a result of the operation, a negative available quantity of one of the goods in the receiving department was obtained. If part or all of the quantity of goods in the receiving department is in reserve, then in order to cancel the completion, it is first necessary to remove the goods from the reservation
msg.paym_has_indc: This payment has a completed acceptance document
msg.no_gds_shipmn: The quantity of goods in one of the positions is more than the available quantity of goods in the department
msg.ne_con_goods: The quantity of goods in department for one or more items is not enough to write off
msg.cant_def_accn: Unable to define the bank account for creating document "{{name}}"
msg.cant_def_cbox: Unable to define the cash room for creating document "{{name}}"
